title: Havana Red
description: A young transvestite in a beautiful red dress is found strangled in a Havana park. Condeâ€™s investigation into a violent murder exposes a stifling, corrupt society, a Cuban reality where nothing is what it seems. A dark and fascinating world of men and women born in the revolution who live without dreaming of exile and seek their identity in the midst of disaster.
author: Leonardo Padura
